#include<cstdio>
int ans[31];

int main() {
int N,Q;
ans[1]=5;
ans[2]=25;
register int i,j,sum;
int five=125;
for(i=3;i<31;i++){
    ans[i]=five;
    five=(five<<2)+five;
}

//printf("%d\n",ans[4]);
scanf("%d",&N);
while(N--){
    scanf("%d",&Q);
    int d=1;
    sum=0;
    while(Q!=0){
        if(Q&1){
            sum+=ans[d];
        }
        Q=Q>>1;
        d++;
    }
    printf("%d\n",sum);
}

return 0;
}
